title: Россиянам предложили попробовать на вкус известные советские фильмы
cleaned_sentences: Russian restaurants in five cities of the country invited visitors to try their favorite films to taste.
This was reported in the press release of the Movix video service and the Association of Chefs Team Russia chefs (is at the disposal of "Lenta.ru").
So, residents and guests of St. Petersburg were offered to try the dish “Hippolytus, you are wrong”, inspired by the legendary Soviet film “The Irony of Fate, or with a slight steam!”.
This is, as you can guess from the name, a bay fish.
To create a suitable surroundings, the Russian fishing restaurant invites guests to put on a fur hat and a mossy checkered scarf during a tasting.
The cook from the Samara restaurant "North" decided to offer the Russians a quail with a beetroot bulgrus and urine lingonberry.
This dish, according to his idea, refers to the phrase “Fedya, game” from the famous comedy Leonid Gaidai “Diamond hand”.
The chefs from the Nizhny Novgorod restaurant TT BISTRO and the Yekaterinburg steak bar "Zhadin Ivyadin" were inspired by French cinema.
In the capital of sunsets, guests are offered to try a duck breast with a battles in textures, a chestnut sauce and mushrooms, a supplemented emulsion of raspberries and juniper oil.
The cook explained that this dish is associated with a series of Taxi films and should be associated with a high -tech car where the main character drove.
And the Ural restaurant decided to surprise visitors with a boleen beef cheek that refers to the film "1+1".
The restaurant “Nash” from Perm the only one chose not a comedy, but a historical and fantastic drama.
The chef presented a cold snack in the Asian style called “Revelation of the Sonmi 451”, referring to the film “Cloud Atlas”.
Earlier it was reported that Russians were surprised by breakfast for tens of thousands of rubles in the Beluga Moscow restaurant.

In the “Breakfast of the Burglak”, which is served in the metropolitan institution for 72 thousand rubles, includes a kilogram of sturgeon caviar, a liter of vodka, potatoes with dill and butter, pickled white mushrooms, small -salted cucumbers, eggs with mayonnaise, as well as rifled loaf, brown bread, canned food, extensions, pancakes and springs.
